snippet: An accused al Qaeda operative charged with engaging in attacks on U.S. forces that killed at least two American servicemen in Afghanistan is set to face trial on Monday in federal court in Brooklyn, New York....

headline.main: Opening a New Chapter at India's 'Grandmothers' School'
headline.print_headline: Opening a New Chapter at India's 'Grandmothers' School'

lead_paragraph: An accused al Qaeda operative charged with engaging in attacks on U.S. forces that killed at least two American servicemen in Afghanistan is set to face trial on Monday in federal court in Brooklyn, New York.
